maintenance.title: Maintenance Mode
maintenance.description: Control the storefront maintenance lock screen and messaging.

status.description: Require a password before anyone can browse storefront pages.

status.disabledHint: Customers can browse the storefront normally.

message.heading: Maintenance message
message.description: Displayed under the logo on the maintenance screen. Keep it short and informative.

toasts.disabled: Maintenance page is no longer displayed.

messages.reset_description: Changes have not been saved yet.
